Weather radar data are useful for so many applications ranging from climate studies, to biological monitoring. With ASDI we are trying to help groups with radar data be able to share it more broadly https://t.co/KJbO732prN

@RajBhardwajMD @GregGinYYC When working on open data I heard someone say, "I don't want to release the data, it's only 60% accurate" and the response was, "if that's good enough for you to use to make a decision, it should be good enough for others too." Perfect is the enemy of the good.
